summary: When the patriarch of the Toda family suddenly dies, his widow discovers that he has left her with nothing but debt and married children who are unwilling to support her--except for her most thoughtful son, just returned from China.
cast: Mieko Takamine|Shin Saburi|Hideo Fujino|Ayako Katsuragi|Mitsuko Yoshikawa|Masao Hayama|Tatsuo Saitô|Kuniko Miyake|Yoshiko Tsubouchi|Michiko Kuwano|Chishû Ryû|Chiyoko Fumiya|Chôko Iida|Yaeko Izumo|Shohichi Kawamura|Toshiaki Konoe|Masami Morikawa|Fumiko Okamura|Eiko Okimoto|Takeshi Sakamoto|Setsuko Shinobu|Mayuko Takagi|Harurô Takeda|Reikô Tani|Kinuko Wakamizu|Isamu Yamaguchi
title: Hermanos y hermanas de la familia Toda
